name: Astro Bros
description:
This is my entry for the 2015-2016 libGDX game jam!

Theme: "Life in Space"

Your goal is to get all of the unconscious Astro Bros into orbit around the star's goldilocks zone. There are a total of three levels, each with more bros to save. If you score perfectly in each level, then you get a shot at a final bonus level around a black hole!

This is my first game that I've completed, and also my first experience with libGDX. I worked alone for this project, all art, animations, programming was done by me. I have to say I enjoyed this experience immensely!
